description:
Networking related commands for Bigswitch that run under rootwrap are used by nova compute to perform VIF plug operations whether nova-network is used or not. If an installer only includes compute.filters on compute nodes, these operations will fail.

While I don't have a precise set of instructions to reproduce, it is pretty clear that the compute.filters doesn't have this command.
title: Bigswitch related command filters are not included compute filters file

comments.content:

comments.content:
This is already resolved for newton here:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/358024/

If appropriate, it would be nice to backport to mitaka.
